entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Border with StrokeShape RoundRectangle does not apply rounding to all corners #18453
  • Setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView on Windows throws NullReferenceException #18452
  • VerticalStackLayout with WidthRequest does not render correctly on iOS and MacCatalyst #18450
  • Label FontFamily is not recognized when setting WindowsPackageType to none and WindowsAppSDKSelfContained to true #18447
  • [net8-rc2] Slow `ModalPage` rendering if a `CollectionView` or `ListView` is used #18445
  • [MAUI][.NET7] After uppercase is enabled, characters are entered in an incorrect sequence on D4 Page #18444
  • SelectionLength Property Not Applied to Entry at Runtime #18443
  • [Windows]Repeated navigation page crash #18441

Closed

  • [regression/7.0.0] Label measuring seems to break the parent layout width #18160
    Backlog
  • Cannot use SwapChainPanel in MAUI - gives error and breaks app. Any workaround or solution? (Windows) #18446
  • Maui iOS crashes on launch in release mode #18438

PullRequests

Created

  • (Windows) Fix backbutton not being drawn for other NavigationPages #18451
    platform/windows 🪟, area/navigation 🧭, i/regression, .NET 8 SR1
  • [ios] update MemoryAnalyzers and cleanup #18449
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎, memory-leak 💦
  • [ci] Bump iOS and Android #18448
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Tizen] Update TizenUIExtensionsVersion #18442
    community ✨

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 8.0.0-preview1.23067.2 to 8.0.0-preview1.23170.2 #18009
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, .NET 8 GA
  • [net8.0] Bump xharness for rtm and bring iOS17 tests #18353
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Merge net8.0 into main #18380
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Resizetizer issues fixes - nuget bumps #16100
    area/single project ☝️, stale, Under Consideration
  • [controls] fix memory leak with `CarouselView` & `INotifyCollectionChanged` #18267
    area/collectionview 📃, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • set the parents to installer #18086
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨, .NET 8 SR1
  • [C] Lowest specificity for propagated values #17648
    .NET 8 SR1
  • [iOS] Fix ContentPage BackgroundImageSource not working #17789
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-pages, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Android] Avoid possible crash using essentials Battery #18386
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞
